titlestmt.title: Illustrations to Shakespeare : electronic edition
titlestmt.principal: Editors: Morris Eaves, University of Rochester; Robert Essick, University of California, Riverside; and Joseph Viscomi, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
titlestmt.sponsor: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and the Library of Congress

filedesc.extent: 54 XML files ranging in size from 10KB to 30KB; 108 JPEG (ISO/IEC 10918) files ranging in size from 80KB to 2000KB
filedesc.publicationstmt: Chapel Hill: Eaves, Essick, Viscomi; UNC LibrariesAugust 2019
